testsuite.system-out: 16:27:02.668 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- Start test: getCourseByIdPositiveTest CourseDto(id=1, title=Web Design basic to advance, price=200, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2019Girls___Beautyful_Girls_Smart_girl_behind_a_laptop_on_a_gray_background_136491_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Design Basics to Advanced Skills course offers comprehensive training covering all aspects of creating attractive, functional, and effective websites. From the art of design to technical implementation, this course is designed to take students from a beginner level to confidently mastering advanced tools and techniques in web design.Introduction to Web Design: Fundamentals of web design, history and evolution, the role of a web designer in the modern world.Design Principles: Color theory, composition, typography, use of space, balance, and proportion.Graphic Design for the Web: Working with graphic editors (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator), creating and editing images for web pages.Layout and Grids: HTML5 and CSS3, semantic markup, responsive and adaptive design, frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap).Interactivity and User Experience (UX): UX/UI design principles, creating interactive elements, navigation, user testing.Animation and Multimedia: CSS animations, using JavaScript to create interactive elements, embedding multimedia content.Optimization and Performance: Image optimization, cache management, improving website performance.Content Handling and Common Tasks: Creating forms, tables, product cards, portfolios, and other common website elements.Advanced Techniques and Tools: Web animation, parallax effects, using web design and development tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch.Project Work and Practical Sessions: Developing a personal web project from start to finish, individual and group projects, feedback and review sessions.) 16:27:02.685 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- PASSED: getCourseByIdPositiveTest 16:27:02.685 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- Stop test 16:27:02.685 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- ******************************* CourseNotFoundError(message=Course not found with id 1200) 16:27:03.746 [Test worker] INFO {"timestamp":"2024-04-08T14:27:04.162+00:00","status":404,"error":"Not Found","path":"/api/cour/1"} 16:27:04.164 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- PASSED: getCourseByIdWithInvalidPathNegTest 16:27:04.164 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- Stop test 16:27:04.164 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- ******************************* 16:27:04.165 [Test worker] INFO com.learn.RAtests.TestBase -- Start test: removeCourseFromCartByIdPositiveTest [CourseDto(id=1, title=Web Design basic to advance, price=200, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2019Girls___Beautyful_Girls_Smart_girl_behind_a_laptop_on_a_gray_background_136491_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Design Basics to Advanced Skills course offers comprehensive training covering all aspects of creating attractive, functional, and effective websites. From the art of design to technical implementation, this course is designed to take students from a beginner level to confidently mastering advanced tools and techniques in web design.Introduction to Web Design: Fundamentals of web design, history and evolution, the role of a web designer in the modern world.Design Principles: Color theory, composition, typography, use of space, balance, and proportion.Graphic Design for the Web: Working with graphic editors (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator), creating and editing images for web pages.Layout and Grids: HTML5 and CSS3, semantic markup, responsive and adaptive design, frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap).Interactivity and User Experience (UX): UX/UI design principles, creating interactive elements, navigation, user testing.Animation and Multimedia: CSS animations, using JavaScript to create interactive elements, embedding multimedia content.Optimization and Performance: Image optimization, cache management, improving website performance.Content Handling and Common Tasks: Creating forms, tables, product cards, portfolios, and other common website elements.Advanced Techniques and Tools: Web animation, parallax effects, using web design and development tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch.Project Work and Practical Sessions: Developing a personal web project from start to finish, individual and group projects, feedback and review sessions.), CourseDto(id=2, title=Web Development basic, price=200, photoPath=https://rsv.ru/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/onlajn-kurs-918x516.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Development Basics to Advanced Skills course is designed to equip participants with a comprehensive understanding of web development, covering fundamental concepts as well as advanced techniques. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to enhance your existing skills, this course offers a structured learning path to master the essentials of web development and advance towards more complex topics.Key Topics Covered:Introduction to Web Development: Overview of web technologies, client-side vs. server-side development, understanding the role of a web developer.HTML Fundamentals: Structuring content with HTML, tags, attributes, semantic markup, forms.CSS Fundamentals: Styling web pages with CSS, selectors, properties, layout techniques, responsive design.JavaScript Basics: Introduction to JavaScript, variables, data types, functions, control flow, DOM manipulation.Version Control with Git: Basics of version control, setting up a Git repository, committing changes, branching, merging.Frontend Frameworks: Introduction to frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js, building dynamic user interfaces.Backend Development: Server-side programming languages (e.g., JavaScript with Node.js, Python with Django or Flask), handling requests, working with databases.API Integration: Consuming APIs, making HTTP requests, handling responses, integrating third-party services.Security Best Practices: Common security threats, implementing authentication, protecting against SQL injection, XSS attacks.Deployment and Hosting: Deploying web applications to servers, cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Heroku), domain management, SSL certificates.Performance Optimization: Techniques to optimize website performance, minimizing load times, reducing file sizes, caching strategies.), CourseDto(id=3, title=Marketing basic to advance, price=260, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2020Computers_Notebook_with_stationery_on_the_table_144170_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a comprehensive exploration of marketing, from its foundational elements to cutting-edge strategies. Begin by understanding market segmentation, targeting, and positioning to tailor your messages effectively. Dive deep into the realm of branding, mastering the art of crafting compelling brand narratives and fostering unwavering brand loyalty. Navigate the dynamic landscape of digital marketing, utilizing powerful tools such as SEO and social media to amplify your brand's presence and engage with your audience on a profound level.Delve into the intricacies of traditional marketing channels, honing your skills in storytelling and adapting your approach to resonate with diverse demographics. As you progress, develop strategic prowess by aligning your marketing objectives with emerging market trends and consumer behaviors. Embrace the power of content marketing and analytics, leveraging data-driven insights to optimize your campaigns and drive tangible results.Your journey in marketing will not only enrich your skill set but also empower you to shape the future of brands and businesses in an increasingly competitive landscape.), CourseDto(id=4, title=Data Entry basic to advance, price=350, photoPath=https://wsltech.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo-1532618403260-5aeffed45f6e-1051x640-2.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a transformative journey in data entry, progressing from fundamental skills to advanced techniques. Begin by mastering the basics of data entry, including accurate keyboarding and efficient data organization. Learn to input data swiftly and accurately, ensuring data integrity from the outset.As you advance, explore techniques for data cleaning and validation, refining your abilities to identify and rectify errors. Dive into advanced data entry software and tools, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity. Harness the power of macros and automation to expedite repetitive tasks, freeing up time for more complex analysis.Delve into the intricacies of data formatting and manipulation, gaining proficiency in spreadsheet software such as Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets. Learn to merge, split, and transform data sets with precision, extracting meaningful insights from raw information.Progress to mastering data entry for specialized fields, such as medical or financial data. Acquire knowledge of industry-specific terminology and standards, ensuring compliance and accuracy in your entries.Embrace the principles of data security and confidentiality, understanding the importance of safeguarding sensitive information. Learn encryption techniques and best practices for data protection, mitigating risks associated with unauthorized access.), CourseDto(id=5, title=QA Automation Engineer, price=320, photoPath=https://img.freepik.com/free-photo/beautiful-young-woman-is-posing-cafe_344912-2001.jpg?t=st=1711644567~exp=1711648167~hmac=30d18ab427a49c877fb278d0162773d27ddeb92aec43fdf01e7b3af4ce885837&w=1060, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on an enriching journey in Quality Assurance (QA) Automation, traversing from fundamental principles to advanced proficiency. Begin by understanding the fundamentals of software testing and automation, including the importance of test planning, execution, and reporting.Learn to navigate popular automation testing tools like Selenium WebDriver, Appium, or Cypress, gaining hands-on experience in creating and executing test scripts. Explore the principles of test automation frameworks such as keyword-driven, data-driven, and behavior-driven development (BDD), understanding their applications in real-world scenarios.As you progress, delve into advanced topics such as test script optimization, parallel testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Master techniques for automating complex scenarios, including API testing, performance testing, and cross-browser testing across multiple devices and platforms.Develop proficiency in programming languages like Java, Python, or JavaScript, leveraging their capabilities to enhance test automation scripts and frameworks. Gain insights into code versioning tools like Git and collaborative platforms like GitHub, enabling seamless collaboration with development teams.Explore the integration of QA automation into Agile and DevOps methodologies, understanding its role in accelerating software delivery cycles while maintaining quality standards. Embrace principles of test-driven development (TDD) and behavior-driven development (BDD), fostering a collaborative testing culture within cross-functional teams.), CourseDto(id=8, title=Backend basics to advanced, price=380, photoPath=https://web-academy.ua/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/learn-online.png, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a journey through the intricate realm of backend development, starting from fundamental concepts and progressing to advanced mastery. Begin by grasping the foundational principles of backend architecture, including server-side programming languages like Python, Java, or Node.js, and understanding the role of databases in storing and retrieving data.Dive deeper into backend frameworks such as Django, Spring Boot, or Express.js, honing your skills in building robust and scalable web applications. Learn about RESTful API design principles, authentication mechanisms, and data modeling techniques, essential for crafting efficient backend solutions.As you advance, explore advanced topics such as microservices architecture, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes. Delve into cloud services like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform, mastering deployment strategies for scalable and resilient backend systems.Enhance your proficiency in database management systems (DBMS) like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity and security. Gain insights into caching mechanisms, message brokers, and asynchronous processing, indispensable for high-performance backend applications.Foster a deep understanding of software development best practices, including version control with Git, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and test-driven development (TDD). Embrace principles of clean code, code readability, and maintainability, ensuring the longevity and scalability of your backend solutions.)] [CourseDto(id=1, title=Web Design basic to advance, price=200, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2019Girls___Beautyful_Girls_Smart_girl_behind_a_laptop_on_a_gray_background_136491_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Design Basics to Advanced Skills course offers comprehensive training covering all aspects of creating attractive, functional, and effective websites. From the art of design to technical implementation, this course is designed to take students from a beginner level to confidently mastering advanced tools and techniques in web design.Introduction to Web Design: Fundamentals of web design, history and evolution, the role of a web designer in the modern world.Design Principles: Color theory, composition, typography, use of space, balance, and proportion.Graphic Design for the Web: Working with graphic editors (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator), creating and editing images for web pages.Layout and Grids: HTML5 and CSS3, semantic markup, responsive and adaptive design, frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap).Interactivity and User Experience (UX): UX/UI design principles, creating interactive elements, navigation, user testing.Animation and Multimedia: CSS animations, using JavaScript to create interactive elements, embedding multimedia content.Optimization and Performance: Image optimization, cache management, improving website performance.Content Handling and Common Tasks: Creating forms, tables, product cards, portfolios, and other common website elements.Advanced Techniques and Tools: Web animation, parallax effects, using web design and development tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch.Project Work and Practical Sessions: Developing a personal web project from start to finish, individual and group projects, feedback and review sessions.), CourseDto(id=2, title=Web Development basic, price=200, photoPath=https://rsv.ru/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/onlajn-kurs-918x516.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Development Basics to Advanced Skills course is designed to equip participants with a comprehensive understanding of web development, covering fundamental concepts as well as advanced techniques. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to enhance your existing skills, this course offers a structured learning path to master the essentials of web development and advance towards more complex topics.Key Topics Covered:Introduction to Web Development: Overview of web technologies, client-side vs. server-side development, understanding the role of a web developer.HTML Fundamentals: Structuring content with HTML, tags, attributes, semantic markup, forms.CSS Fundamentals: Styling web pages with CSS, selectors, properties, layout techniques, responsive design.JavaScript Basics: Introduction to JavaScript, variables, data types, functions, control flow, DOM manipulation.Version Control with Git: Basics of version control, setting up a Git repository, committing changes, branching, merging.Frontend Frameworks: Introduction to frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js, building dynamic user interfaces.Backend Development: Server-side programming languages (e.g., JavaScript with Node.js, Python with Django or Flask), handling requests, working with databases.API Integration: Consuming APIs, making HTTP requests, handling responses, integrating third-party services.Security Best Practices: Common security threats, implementing authentication, protecting against SQL injection, XSS attacks.Deployment and Hosting: Deploying web applications to servers, cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Heroku), domain management, SSL certificates.Performance Optimization: Techniques to optimize website performance, minimizing load times, reducing file sizes, caching strategies.), CourseDto(id=3, title=Marketing basic to advance, price=260, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2020Computers_Notebook_with_stationery_on_the_table_144170_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a comprehensive exploration of marketing, from its foundational elements to cutting-edge strategies. Begin by understanding market segmentation, targeting, and positioning to tailor your messages effectively. Dive deep into the realm of branding, mastering the art of crafting compelling brand narratives and fostering unwavering brand loyalty. Navigate the dynamic landscape of digital marketing, utilizing powerful tools such as SEO and social media to amplify your brand's presence and engage with your audience on a profound level.Delve into the intricacies of traditional marketing channels, honing your skills in storytelling and adapting your approach to resonate with diverse demographics. As you progress, develop strategic prowess by aligning your marketing objectives with emerging market trends and consumer behaviors. Embrace the power of content marketing and analytics, leveraging data-driven insights to optimize your campaigns and drive tangible results.Your journey in marketing will not only enrich your skill set but also empower you to shape the future of brands and businesses in an increasingly competitive landscape.), CourseDto(id=4, title=Data Entry basic to advance, price=350, photoPath=https://wsltech.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo-1532618403260-5aeffed45f6e-1051x640-2.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a transformative journey in data entry, progressing from fundamental skills to advanced techniques. Begin by mastering the basics of data entry, including accurate keyboarding and efficient data organization. Learn to input data swiftly and accurately, ensuring data integrity from the outset.As you advance, explore techniques for data cleaning and validation, refining your abilities to identify and rectify errors. Dive into advanced data entry software and tools, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity. Harness the power of macros and automation to expedite repetitive tasks, freeing up time for more complex analysis.Delve into the intricacies of data formatting and manipulation, gaining proficiency in spreadsheet software such as Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets. Learn to merge, split, and transform data sets with precision, extracting meaningful insights from raw information.Progress to mastering data entry for specialized fields, such as medical or financial data. Acquire knowledge of industry-specific terminology and standards, ensuring compliance and accuracy in your entries.Embrace the principles of data security and confidentiality, understanding the importance of safeguarding sensitive information. Learn encryption techniques and best practices for data protection, mitigating risks associated with unauthorized access.), CourseDto(id=5, title=QA Automation Engineer, price=320, photoPath=https://img.freepik.com/free-photo/beautiful-young-woman-is-posing-cafe_344912-2001.jpg?t=st=1711644567~exp=1711648167~hmac=30d18ab427a49c877fb278d0162773d27ddeb92aec43fdf01e7b3af4ce885837&w=1060, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on an enriching journey in Quality Assurance (QA) Automation, traversing from fundamental principles to advanced proficiency. Begin by understanding the fundamentals of software testing and automation, including the importance of test planning, execution, and reporting.Learn to navigate popular automation testing tools like Selenium WebDriver, Appium, or Cypress, gaining hands-on experience in creating and executing test scripts. Explore the principles of test automation frameworks such as keyword-driven, data-driven, and behavior-driven development (BDD), understanding their applications in real-world scenarios.As you progress, delve into advanced topics such as test script optimization, parallel testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Master techniques for automating complex scenarios, including API testing, performance testing, and cross-browser testing across multiple devices and platforms.Develop proficiency in programming languages like Java, Python, or JavaScript, leveraging their capabilities to enhance test automation scripts and frameworks. Gain insights into code versioning tools like Git and collaborative platforms like GitHub, enabling seamless collaboration with development teams.Explore the integration of QA automation into Agile and DevOps methodologies, understanding its role in accelerating software delivery cycles while maintaining quality standards. Embrace principles of test-driven development (TDD) and behavior-driven development (BDD), fostering a collaborative testing culture within cross-functional teams.), CourseDto(id=8, title=Backend basics to advanced, price=380, photoPath=https://web-academy.ua/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/learn-online.png, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a journey through the intricate realm of backend development, starting from fundamental concepts and progressing to advanced mastery. Begin by grasping the foundational principles of backend architecture, including server-side programming languages like Python, Java, or Node.js, and understanding the role of databases in storing and retrieving data.Dive deeper into backend frameworks such as Django, Spring Boot, or Express.js, honing your skills in building robust and scalable web applications. Delve into cloud services like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform, mastering deployment strategies for scalable and resilient backend systems.Enhance your proficiency in database management systems (DBMS) like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity and security. Gain insights into caching mechanisms, message brokers, and asynchronous processing, indispensable for high-performance backend applications.Foster a deep understanding of software development best practices, including version control with Git, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and test-driven development (TDD). From the art of design to technical implementation, this course is designed to take students from a beginner level to confidently mastering advanced tools and techniques in web design.Introduction to Web Design: Fundamentals of web design, history and evolution, the role of a web designer in the modern world.Design Principles: Color theory, composition, typography, use of space, balance, and proportion.Graphic Design for the Web: Working with graphic editors (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator), creating and editing images for web pages.Layout and Grids: HTML5 and CSS3, semantic markup, responsive and adaptive design, frameworks (e.g., Bootstrap).Interactivity and User Experience (UX): UX/UI design principles, creating interactive elements, navigation, user testing.Animation and Multimedia: CSS animations, using JavaScript to create interactive elements, embedding multimedia content.Optimization and Performance: Image optimization, cache management, improving website performance.Content Handling and Common Tasks: Creating forms, tables, product cards, portfolios, and other common website elements.Advanced Techniques and Tools: Web animation, parallax effects, using web design and development tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, Sketch.Project Work and Practical Sessions: Developing a personal web project from start to finish, individual and group projects, feedback and review sessions.), CourseDto(id=2, title=Web Development basic, price=200, photoPath=https://rsv.ru/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/onlajn-kurs-918x516.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Development Basics to Advanced Skills course is designed to equip participants with a comprehensive understanding of web development, covering fundamental concepts as well as advanced techniques. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to enhance your existing skills, this course offers a structured learning path to master the essentials of web development and advance towards more complex topics.Key Topics Covered:Introduction to Web Development: Overview of web technologies, client-side vs. server-side development, understanding the role of a web developer.HTML Fundamentals: Structuring content with HTML, tags, attributes, semantic markup, forms.CSS Fundamentals: Styling web pages with CSS, selectors, properties, layout techniques, responsive design.JavaScript Basics: Introduction to JavaScript, variables, data types, functions, control flow, DOM manipulation.Version Control with Git: Basics of version control, setting up a Git repository, committing changes, branching, merging.Frontend Frameworks: Introduction to frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js, building dynamic user interfaces.Backend Development: Server-side programming languages (e.g., JavaScript with Node.js, Python with Django or Flask), handling requests, working with databases.API Integration: Consuming APIs, making HTTP requests, handling responses, integrating third-party services.Security Best Practices: Common security threats, implementing authentication, protecting against SQL injection, XSS attacks.Deployment and Hosting: Deploying web applications to servers, cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Heroku), domain management, SSL certificates.Performance Optimization: Techniques to optimize website performance, minimizing load times, reducing file sizes, caching strategies.), CourseDto(id=3, title=Marketing basic to advance, price=260, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2020Computers_Notebook_with_stationery_on_the_table_144170_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a comprehensive exploration of marketing, from its foundational elements to cutting-edge strategies. Begin by understanding market segmentation, targeting, and positioning to tailor your messages effectively. Dive deep into the realm of branding, mastering the art of crafting compelling brand narratives and fostering unwavering brand loyalty. Navigate the dynamic landscape of digital marketing, utilizing powerful tools such as SEO and social media to amplify your brand's presence and engage with your audience on a profound level.Delve into the intricacies of traditional marketing channels, honing your skills in storytelling and adapting your approach to resonate with diverse demographics. As you progress, develop strategic prowess by aligning your marketing objectives with emerging market trends and consumer behaviors. Embrace the power of content marketing and analytics, leveraging data-driven insights to optimize your campaigns and drive tangible results.Your journey in marketing will not only enrich your skill set but also empower you to shape the future of brands and businesses in an increasingly competitive landscape.), CourseDto(id=4, title=Data Entry basic to advance, price=350, photoPath=https://wsltech.com.br/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/photo-1532618403260-5aeffed45f6e-1051x640-2.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a transformative journey in data entry, progressing from fundamental skills to advanced techniques. Begin by mastering the basics of data entry, including accurate keyboarding and efficient data organization. Learn to input data swiftly and accurately, ensuring data integrity from the outset.As you advance, explore techniques for data cleaning and validation, refining your abilities to identify and rectify errors. Dive into advanced data entry software and tools, streamlining processes and enhancing productivity. Harness the power of macros and automation to expedite repetitive tasks, freeing up time for more complex analysis.Delve into the intricacies of data formatting and manipulation, gaining proficiency in spreadsheet software such as Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets. Learn to merge, split, and transform data sets with precision, extracting meaningful insights from raw information.Progress to mastering data entry for specialized fields, such as medical or financial data. Acquire knowledge of industry-specific terminology and standards, ensuring compliance and accuracy in your entries.Embrace the principles of data security and confidentiality, understanding the importance of safeguarding sensitive information. Learn encryption techniques and best practices for data protection, mitigating risks associated with unauthorized access.), CourseDto(id=5, title=QA Automation Engineer, price=320, photoPath=https://img.freepik.com/free-photo/beautiful-young-woman-is-posing-cafe_344912-2001.jpg?t=st=1711644567~exp=1711648167~hmac=30d18ab427a49c877fb278d0162773d27ddeb92aec43fdf01e7b3af4ce885837&w=1060, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on an enriching journey in Quality Assurance (QA) Automation, traversing from fundamental principles to advanced proficiency. Begin by understanding the fundamentals of software testing and automation, including the importance of test planning, execution, and reporting.Learn to navigate popular automation testing tools like Selenium WebDriver, Appium, or Cypress, gaining hands-on experience in creating and executing test scripts. Explore the principles of test automation frameworks such as keyword-driven, data-driven, and behavior-driven development (BDD), understanding their applications in real-world scenarios.As you progress, delve into advanced topics such as test script optimization, parallel testing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Master techniques for automating complex scenarios, including API testing, performance testing, and cross-browser testing across multiple devices and platforms.Develop proficiency in programming languages like Java, Python, or JavaScript, leveraging their capabilities to enhance test automation scripts and frameworks. Gain insights into code versioning tools like Git and collaborative platforms like GitHub, enabling seamless collaboration with development teams.Explore the integration of QA automation into Agile and DevOps methodologies, understanding its role in accelerating software delivery cycles while maintaining quality standards. Embrace principles of test-driven development (TDD) and behavior-driven development (BDD), fostering a collaborative testing culture within cross-functional teams.), CourseDto(id=8, title=Backend basics to advanced, price=380, photoPath=https://web-academy.ua/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/learn-online.png, presentationPath=null, description=Embark on a journey through the intricate realm of backend development, starting from fundamental concepts and progressing to advanced mastery. Begin by grasping the foundational principles of backend architecture, including server-side programming languages like Python, Java, or Node.js, and understanding the role of databases in storing and retrieving data.Dive deeper into backend frameworks such as Django, Spring Boot, or Express.js, honing your skills in building robust and scalable web applications. Learn about RESTful API design principles, authentication mechanisms, and data modeling techniques, essential for crafting efficient backend solutions.As you advance, explore advanced topics such as microservices architecture, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes. Delve into cloud services like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform, mastering deployment strategies for scalable and resilient backend systems.Enhance your proficiency in database management systems (DBMS) like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity and security. Gain insights into caching mechanisms, message brokers, and asynchronous processing, indispensable for high-performance backend applications.Foster a deep understanding of software development best practices, including version control with Git, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD), and test-driven development (TDD). Embrace principles of clean code, code readability, and maintainability, ensuring the longevity and scalability of your backend solutions.)] [CourseDto(id=1, title=Web Design basic to advance, price=200, photoPath=https://www.zastavki.com/pictures/1024x768/2019Girls___Beautyful_Girls_Smart_girl_behind_a_laptop_on_a_gray_background_136491_1.jpg, presentationPath=null, description=The From Web Design Basics to Advanced Skills course offers comprehensive training covering all aspects of creating attractive, functional, and effective websites.
